transcript_chunks.text: until da PS5 and PC remake suffers a rough launch uh I mean this definitely is performing worse than I thought it would but when we think of the PC audience who maybe puts all of their heart and soul and money into I want this PC to be able to play a whole bunch of Library games we talk about PlayStation's exclusives going towards PC I could name probably 10 other games above until dawn that PC players are really clamoring for I'm not really shocked by the low player base I'm I'm shocked with how low it is but I'm not shocked that it's low period right like
